      • Button

        public Button(processing.core.PImage img,
              double centerX,
              double centerY,
              int w,
              int h,
              java.lang.String text,
              int textSize)
        Constructs a Button.
        Parameters:
        img - The image to be used.
        centerX - The x-coordinate of the center of the Button.
        centerY - The y-coordinate of the center of the Button.
        w - The width of the Button.
        h - The height of the Button.
        text - The text to be displayed on the Button.
        textSize - The text size for the text.

        mouseY - The x-coordinate (of the mouse).
